thread.title: 'Star Wars: The Force Awakens' Final Trailer Released
thread.title_full: 'Star Wars: The Force Awakens' Final Trailer Released

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: 'Star Wars: The Force Awakens' Final Trailer Released
text:
Comments The two-minute video puts the spotlight on epic battles and explosions while also showing main protagonist and antagonist characters. 
Following the new poster and teasers , Lucasfilm and Walt Disney Pictures have released a full-length final trailer for the highly-anticipated " Star Wars: The Force Awakens ". Debuted during ESPN's "Monday Night Football", the trailer shows a lot of big moments in the movie while also leaving a lot of mysteries left unanswered. Daisy Ridley 's Rey and John Boyega 's Finn dominate the trailer as they engage in the massive war, suggesting that they are the main heroes in the upcoming movie. Finn is seen fighting against an enemy with his lightsaber. The two-minute video also gives away some details about the First Order, which is the new incarnation of the Empire from the original series. Another big revelation is when the new antagonist, Kylo Ren, talks clearly to a damaged helmet of Darth Vader, hinting that he will fight for the leader of the Empire. "I will finish what you started," Ren said. Disney previously announced that the premiere of the final trailer would also be the beginning of ticket sales for "The Force Awakens" as well as for a seven-episode "Star Wars" marathon that starts on December 17. Directed by J.J. Abrams, "The Force Awakens" also stars Harrison Ford , Mark Hamill , Carrie Fisher , Adam Driver , Oscar Isaac , Lupita Nyong'o , Andy Serkis , Domhnall Gleeson , Anthony Daniels, Peter Mayhew and Max Von Sydow . The seventh installment of the blockbuster franchise will arrive Stateside on December 18.
